content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for considering my apartment. I'm sure it's a great fit for you! However, I'm afraid we can't come to an agreement on the rental price at this time. My goal is to maximize my earnings, and I believe that the price I'm asking is fair. If you have any counteroffers, feel free to share them with me. Otherwise, I'm sorry to say that I'll have to terminate our negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position. Can I ask you a few questions about the apartment? What is included in the rent? Do you have any additional fees I should be aware of? And can I make any changes to the apartment?
name: Maria Mamani

content: Sure, I'd be happy to answer your questions. The rent for the apartment includes all utilities, including electricity, water, and gas. There are no additional fees. However, I do require a security deposit of one month's rent. As for making changes to the apartment, I'm afraid I can't allow any modifications to be made. It's important to keep the apartment in its original condition. If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask!
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. Thank you for sharing this information. I'm sorry to say that I'm not interested in the apartment at this time. I appreciate your time, but I'll have to look elsewhere. Thank you for your understanding.

TERMINATE
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for letting me know. I understand if you're not interested in the apartment at this time. I appreciate your understanding and wish you the best of luck in your search. If you have any other questions or if the apartment becomes available in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
